sentences.en: A policeman was killed and scores of people were injured in the melee.
sentences.cn: 混战中一名警察被打死，许多人受伤。

sentences.en: And melee combat is now available to get people to comply.
sentences.cn: 混战对遵守的人们可以用到.

sentences.en: Effect : Rebukes your opponent, increasing melee damage by 59 and stunning for 2 seconds.
sentences.cn: 训斥你的对手, 增加肉搏(理)害59点,打晕2秒.

sentences.en: Enchant Weapon - Major Intellect: Permanently enchant a melee weapon to grant + 30 Intellect.
sentences.cn: 使一件武器永久的获得伤害+7的效果.

sentences.en: He will be immune to all melee damage during this phase.
In the melee that followed they trampled their mother a couple of times.
sentences.cn: 三个打在一团,七手八脚的又踩了二强嫂几下.

sentences.en: Nearby friendly melee units gain hit points when they hit enemy units.
sentences.cn: 附近的近身友方单位在攻击时能吸取一定的生命,范围300.

sentences.en: Slowly charges up as the Necron Lord receives melee damage.
sentences.cn: 慢慢地索价在当Necron公爵接收互殴损失上面.

sentences.en: Talent: ( Restoration ) - Natural Perfection will no longer proc by normal melee attacks.
sentences.cn: 天赋: 天然完美现在不会被普通的近战攻击触发.

sentences.en: Targets will still have their melee attack speed reduced.
The Templar is a melee oriented character with minimal ranged support weaponry.
sentences.cn: 圣堂是以近身格斗为主的角色,所以他的武器射程非常近.

sentences.en: There is no Heroes IV - style separation of melee and ranged attack types.
sentences.cn: 与四代不同,不会将攻击力分为近身和远程两种.

sentences.en: Ursa is now a melee hero ( recent patch fixed the issue, 137702 )
sentences.cn: 熊战士现在是近战英雄了 ( 最新的补丁修正了这个问题 )

sentences.en: Weapons come in two basic categories: melee and ranged.
sentences.cn: 武器分为两大类: 近战和远程.

sentences.en: When u see mages having a lower melee miss rate.
sentences.cn: 当你看到法师的近战命中率远低于你的.

sentences.en: When u see mags having a lower melee miss rate.
sentences.cn: 当你看到法师的近战命中率远高于你的.

trans.tran_cn: <主文> 混战，乱战，混乱，混乱的人群
trans.tran_en: A melee is a noisy, confusing fight between the people in a crowd
